lead_paragraph: Though the 0.6 percent increase in new orders topped expectations, it was the smallest rise since August 2009.
snippet: Though the 0.6 percent increase in new orders topped expectations, it was the smallest rise since August 2009.

headline.main: U.S. Factory Orders Rose in February
